title: Texas Attorney General Paxton Faces Setbacks in Court (Audio)
itunes:title: Texas Attorney General Paxton Faces Setbacks in Court (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Laurel Callkins, a reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, who has faced several legal setbacks over the past weeks. She speaks with Bloomberg’s June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
